Class PixelStarAnimator

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.tetris.view.PixelStarAnimator
public class PixelStarAnimator extends Object
PixelStarAnimator creates and animates small twinkling pixel stars across the screen. These stars stay in place and twinkle (fade in/out) to create a starfield effect.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PixelStarAnimator()
    Creates a new PixelStarAnimator with default screen dimensions.
    PixelStarAnimator(double screenWidth, double screenHeight)
    Creates a new PixelStarAnimator with custom screen dimensions.

      parentPane - the pane to add stars to
      starCount - the number of stars to create
